resources.string: Open your Steam Client or App, Click and goto your Profile page in Steam Client and click Edit Profile.
Make sure to not set your Steam profile to private. If your Steam Profile is set to Private, Change it to Public.
Make sure to not set your Game Details to private. If your Game Details is set to Private, Change it to Public.
Make sure to not have the checkbox checked in below image. The checkbox should be disabled, The app cannot fetch game info otherwise.
Find your Steam profile URL id as shown in below image. This username is needed for configuration. Make sure to write it down or remember.
